name: powerslyde
tag_list: ios, android, app-discovery, mobile-apps, samsung, social, app-sharing
overview:
powerslyde is a social app discovery platform. Discover and share apps with friends and family.

There are millions of mobile apps in the App Store. How do you discover the right ones for you? Powerslyde helps you find the right apps for you with a little help from your friends. Receive personal app recommendations, automatically see when your friends add new apps, and share apps with your friends with one swipe.

Discovery – Compare your apps to your friends apps. Referral – Use the power of “signaling”. In the presence of little or no information people do what their friends say, and when there is too much information, people do what their trusted friends say. Community – Unlock the power of your community to discover great new apps.

With PowerSlyde you can easily: See what apps your friends have. Create collections of your favorite apps. Refer single apps or entire collections. Manage your privacy settings, so your friends only see the apps you’re comfortable sharing.
